entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
